{{Infobox_Radio_station | name = Radyo ng Bayan Zamboanga | image = | city = [[Zamboanga City]] | area = [[Zamboanga Peninsula (Administrative Region)|Zamboanga]] | branding = Radyo ng Bayan (National Radio) | slogan = Tagapag-ugnay ng Pamhalaan at ng Mamamayan (Converging Government and Citizens) | airdate = 1950 | frequency = 1170 kHz | format = [[news]], [[Public affairs programming|public affairs]], [[entertainment]] | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = '''DX'''
'''M'''indanao
'''R'''adyo | owner = [[Philippine Broadcasting Service, Inc.|Philippine Broadcasting Service]] | website = }} '''DXMR''' (1170 kHz [[Zamboanga City]]) is an [[AM broadcasting|AM]] station owned and operated by [[Philippine Broadcasting Service]] in the [[Philippines]], Located at [[Zamboanga City]]. ==Radyo Ng Bayan Stations Nationwide== :''Further information: [[Philippine Broadcasting Service, Inc.#Stations|Radyo ng Bayan stations]]'' {{Zamboanga City Radio}} {{Philippines-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Philippines}} [[Category:Radio stations established in 1950]] [[Category:National Broadcasting Network]]
